data.goal: Memory landfill cleanup - remove smoke-test pollution and establish decision-evidence linkage
plan: Audit current state of decisions and episodes
Link real decisions to evidence episodes

actions.summary: Deleted 310 smoke-test facts, 117 smoke-test decisions, 200+ smoke-test episodes. Pruned orphan embeddings. Reduced total artifacts from 2441 to 1657.
Linked 6 real decisions to evidence episodes: roadmap to Fashanus, Phase 1 decisions to E2E test, architecture decisions to this cleanup episode.

data.result_summary: Memory landfill cleaned: 627 smoke-test artifacts deleted (310 facts, 117 decisions, 200+ episodes), artifacts reduced from 2441 to 1657, embedding coverage healthy at 99.4%. Established decision-evidence linkage pattern by linking 6 decisions to real episodes.
warnings: skills_used missing: episode closed with result but no skills recorded
